data.event: Milford was first settled in 1662 and was officially incorporated in 1780.
Milford was first settled in 1662 and was officially incorporated in 1780.
Milford is renowned for its pink Milford granite, discovered in 1870.
Today, it is recognized, in part, for its health care facility—the Milford Regional Medical Center.
In January 2008, the Center opened a cancer treatment facility with the Dana–Farber Cancer Institute.
Milford is also the home of the "My One Wish" foundation, started in 1984.
